Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7776 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7776 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.2.2-5, affected by CVE-2024-7776
